title: Increase Your Personal Brand with a Low Budget
description:
Why spend a lot of money to create a successful brand, when you can do the same thing with a small budget?  
Increase Your Personal Brand with a Low Budget
 can help you get closer to those who need your help. Learn how to be different from your competitors and choose one of the three main strategies used to build a powerful brand!  If you are a trainer, a public speaker, a coach, a psychologist, a freelancer, or you have a personal area of expertise and you want to grow your own brand, then, maybe you should read this book.
author: Andy Kafman
